ygData.subject: Re: Underwater areas
ygData.msgSnippet: >From: "Omega8" <omega8@mindspring.com> > >That little area behind teh waterfall in Surefall Glad is
ygData.messageBody:
<html><div>>From: "Omega8" <omega8@...></div>
<div>></div>
<div>>That little area behind teh waterfall in Surefall Glad is NOT so
little, and</div>
<div>>it's a death trap if you are anything other than a Ranger or
Druid.  That's</div>
<div>>a not so sevret cave where a bunch of bears live and it's where
part of the</div>
<div>>"poacher" quest for Rangers takes place.  My
suggestion?  Dont go back there</div>
<div>>unless you enjoy getting mauled by bears and slaughtered by
NPC's for the</div>
<div>>heinous crime of getting mauled by bears.</div>
<div>></div>
<br>
<div>I know the feeling.  I went in there with my bard.  Was
showing a friend the sights as he had not been to that part of the world
before.  Now I had been back there with my druid character and only
had problems with the poachers.  Well, we walk in and I say do not
attack the bears then WHAM this big ugly named grizzley attacks me. 
I run out without attacking back and then find about 3 NPCs chasing
me.  I almost made it to the zone but ran into one of the walls
while running at Selo Speed 8)  Fortunately, I had gotten myself
bound in Qeynos.</div>
<br>
<BR>

<div align="center">
------------------------------------------------------------------------
<br>
<b>Albereth - 20th Circle Halfling Druid<br>
Master Brewer<br>
The Arcane Order<br>
Mithaniel Marr Server<br>
</b>------------------------------------------------------------------------
<br>
</html>
